column7: accessed=6 March 2015}}</ref>) was a linguist and artist from New York. His artwork has been published in ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', ''[[Mythlore]]'', ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', ''[[Little Gwaihir]]'' and several other journals.<ref name=ELF>{{webcite
column13: accessed=6 March 2015}}</ref> He also had work in the ''[[Halls of the Elven-king]]'', a supplement in the [[Middle-earth Role Playing
